statements: SELECT * FROM LearningPlans WHERE learner_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT goal, skills_assessment FROM LearningPlans WHERE plan_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
SELECT plan_id, learner_id, goal FROM LearningPlans WHERE skills_assessment LIKE 'Advanced%';
SELECT * FROM LearningPlans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LearningPlans;
SELECT * FROM LearningPlans WHERE learner_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT goal, skills_assessment FROM LearningPlans WHERE learner_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT * FROM LearningPlans WHERE goal LIKE '%programming%' OR goal LIKE '%development%';
SELECT plan_id, goal FROM LearningPlans WHERE skills_assessment IS NOT NULL ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT learner_id FROM LearningPlans WHERE goal = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY learner_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LearningGoals;
SELECT goal_description, goal_category FROM LearningGoals;
SELECT goal_description FROM LearningGoals WHERE goal_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SkillsAssessments;
SELECT student_id, assessed_skill, assessment_date FROM SkillsAssessments WHERE assessment_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM LearningGoals WHERE goal_category = 'Programming';
SELECT goal_description, goal_category FROM LearningGoals WHERE goal_id = 3;
SELECT assessment_id, student_id, assessed_skill FROM SkillsAssessments WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT goal_description FROM LearningGoals ORDER BY goal_id DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date FROM SkillsAssessments WHERE assessed_skill LIKE '%SQL%' AND assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM learner_goals;
SELECT learner_id, goal FROM learner_goals WHERE learner_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM skills_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT learner_id, skill_area, proficiency_level FROM skills_assessments WHERE proficiency_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT plan_id, plan_start_date, plan_end_date, plan_description FROM learning_plans WHERE learner_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM learner_goals
SELECT learner_id, goal FROM learner_goals WHERE learner_id = 1
SELECT * FROM skills_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT skill_area FROM skills_assessments
SELECT learner_id, COUNT(assessment_id) AS num_assessments FROM skills_assessments GROUP BY learner_id HAVING COUNT(assessment_id) > 2
SELECT * FROM goals;
SELECT goal_id, goal_description FROM goals WHERE learner_id = 123;
SELECT skill_name, skill_category FROM skills ORDER BY skill_category ASC;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM assessments WHERE score > 80;
SELECT plan_id, learner_id, goal_id, skill_id FROM learning_plans WHERE plan_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM goals WHERE learner_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM assessments WHERE score > 90;
SELECT skill_name, skill_category FROM skills ORDER BY skill_category DESC;
SELECT goal_id, goal_description FROM goals WHERE goal_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT assessments.assessment_name, goals.goal_description FROM assessments JOIN goals ON assessments.skill_id = goals.goal_id;
SELECT * FROM LearningPlan;
SELECT learner_id, goal, start_date FROM LearningPlan WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Learner ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT assessment_date, skill_category, skill_level FROM SkillsAssessment WHERE skill_level >= 3 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM SkillCategory WHERE parent_category_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM LearningPlan WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT goal_description, category FROM Goal WHERE category = 'Software Development';
SELECT learner_id, assessment_date FROM SkillsAssessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Learner WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT learner_id, email FROM Learner JOIN LearningPlan ON Learner.learner_id = LearningPlan.learner_id WHERE LearningPlan.end_date < '2022-12-31';
